sources.title: The Virginian
sources.description: Cecil B Demille's silent feature film version of Owen Wister's novel "The Virginian" starring Dustin Farnum. A cowboy romances the local school teacher and helps apprehend a gang of cattle rustlers.

sources.title: The Virginian (1914) - Upscaled and Enhanced
sources.description: The Virginian (1914) - Directed by Cecil B. DeMille https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Virginian_(1914_film) https://www.cecilbdemille.com/portfolio-item/the-virginian/ Deinterlaced using Handbrake - (Decomb + Preset: EEDI2) Upscaled and enhanced using Topaz Video AI - (AI Model: Iris + Recover Original Detail 20 + Grain: Amount 7, Size 2) Topaz Video AI is software that uses artificial intelligence to enhance the quality of video footage. These settings produced the result that I was happiest with. Additional tweaking along with different settings may have improved the results further, however, I don't have the time nor the experience for that kind of experimentation. I added the layer of film grain to improve the visuals: it replaces the original grain that is often lost during the denoising process AND it prevents the picture from looking too cartoonish/waxy which can be caused by the enhancement process. Overall I am very impressed with the results - comparing it with the source video it's like night and day. I highly recommend Topaz Video AI. The source video can be found here: https://archive.org/details/TheVirginian Many thanks to the Video Cellar Collection for the source: http://www.thevideocellar.com/ The Virginian: Directed by: Cecil B. DeMille Screenplay by: Cecil B. DeMille Produced by: Jesse L. Lasky Based on: The Virginian by Owen Wister Starring: Dustin Farnum Cinematography: Alvin Wyckoff Edited by: Cecil B. DeMille, Mamie Wagner Production Company: Jesse L. Lasky Feature Play Company Distributed by: Paramount Pictures Released: 7th September 1914

metadata.Plot: Wyoming schoolteacher Molly Wood is attracted to a cowboy known as "The Virginian." He has to help hang his best friend Steve when the latter falls in with a bunch of cattle thieves led by Trampas. Eventually the Virginian must take on the bad guys and get the girl.
metadata.Actors: Dustin Farnum, Jack W. Johnston, Sydney Deane
